content.data:
[Y]Plus Range
[W]ASIC extras and cartridge ambitions.
[c][m.]
[W]The Plus line added hardware features
[W]that opened new visual options for
[W]developers.
[W]Compatibility with earlier software
[W]remained a practical concern for most
[W]projects.
[c][m.]
[G]- Extra hardware features.
[G]- Different production era.
[G]- Collector interest remains high.
[m][m-]
[Y]CALL OUT
[C]Short market life, long conversation.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
